website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a unique and fun float for toddlers. Otherwise, it's not very versatile and too large for small children.
pros: Gives little ones a "big" float experience with a spacious seat and removable sun canopy
Comes with several bath-type toys for added fun
cons: A couple design flaws, including large leg holes and flimsy steering wheel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: We took my 5 month old out to the pool with this. He was too small to sit up in it, but he laid back and enjoyed being towed around and slashing! Canopy is removable. -1 star because the steering wheel is really loose, not sure if it's something we can fix or not.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Leah

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old pulled off the steering wheel as ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old pulled off the steering wheel as soon as I sat him into float. :-( The valve is decent. The opening is large so you either have to blow is by mouth or hack your pump to blow it up. However it does have a clever insert that keeps air from escaping while you are blowing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Nirali Patel

customer_reviews.title: It's okay not worth this much $
customer_reviews.text: Floats well but within a minute my 6month old was able to rip the steering wheel off and we couldn't get it back on it was delivered today and lasted all of 5 seconds before being broke... also says 6 months and it was way to big for him to sit in comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bruno

customer_reviews.title: baby pool float IN THE SUNSHINE
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable. Blew it up and my grandson has not even used it yet, just floated around the pool and the canapy will not hold the air. Not sure if has a hole? but it wasnt very durable for the $ we will see if he floats and it hold him up when he comes soon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ok, fun idea!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea!! My nephew loved it!! Until the steering wheel kept coming off and there that kind of sharp mount under it where the steering wheel attaches.. so my sister kept having to cover it/shield it so he wouldn't hit it with his head/eyes..
customer_reviews.author: cape039

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: the float is exactly as described! My son loves the wheel and horn. We use this float in our lazy river and it holds up great! It does great against the bigger tubes and kids swimming around bumping into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning! Leg holes are huge for 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: The leg holes in this float are huge! I will be returning. I don't feel comfortable with my son in it long enough to even adjust my bathing suit top.
customer_reviews.author: kandis stewart

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it especially the steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it especially the steering wheel. My only complaint is the horn must have gotten flattened in the package and would no longer stay expanded
customer_reviews.author: La La

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for my one year old twin grandsons. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my one year old twin grandsons. My daughter loves them! Just enough shade and keeps them buoyant in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma N

customer_reviews.title: Loses air
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine the other day and my baby LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Pernilla

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk! Horn fell off, shade kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Horn fell off, shade kept falling off the float & when it did stay on, it wouldn't stay up to actually provide shade for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty. The foot holes to large
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty. The foot holes to large. It is made for a two or three year old. It is not good for a one year old. Hopefully I can use it next year.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our 1st time in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Inflate as soon as you receive
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use my product until a while after I received it, and when I inflated it, it had a big hole. Useless now, and my window to return passed 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ana Romero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1.5 year old. It's not too snug so perfect for my 99% scale baby. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Steering is wrong,
customer_reviews.text: Steering is in wrong side, but i lose my time to return.
customer_reviews.author: yunior

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it few times and satisfied with the product. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Satinder Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Though the hole in which he sits in is big for my grandson, I just folded up a towel to fill in the,space, his legs fit perfectly in the leg holes. Wide enough so he can not put his face in the water (so there's no worry about dry drowning). If you don't know what that is, please, look that up. He likes being in it. And the little toys, he uses in the bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: debbie g.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is very funny. Has good quality and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: Terrible item. As soon as it was inflated a ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item. As soon as it was inflated a small hole appeared in the seam causing an air leak. If this is an upgrade i dont want to know how the original was.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

product_meta.title: PFLOAT [2017 Upgraded Design] Baby Pool Float With Sun Canopy,Inflatable Boat Swimming Float With Large Valves-3 Bath Toys&Carry Bag
product_meta.description: pfloat INC design and creat inflatable pool toys,Crafted with beautiful curves, vibrant colors, and the utmost attention to detail, pfloat inflatable pool toys are made with only the highest quality, non-phthalate vinyl to ensure the finest floating experience
feature_bullets: All UPGRATED:This float has a feed bottle/drink holder,Very convenient when you need to feed your little darling or need a drink on pool ,It has Large valves,5X faster inflate/deflate.Come with 3 cute bath toys keep your baby entertained.

rotatable steering wheel and beep horn,baby always love to play it . Boat: 29 x 25 inch(LxW) Canopy: 25.5 x 15.5 inch(L x W). Our Inflatable Baby Float is suitable for the age 6-36 months baby(about 44lb),UPF 50+ removable Canopy can protect the baby from the sun.

UPGRATED SEAT: reinforced safety seat,thicken and inflatable seat cushion makes baby bottoms feel no tight and takes good care of baby's tender skin, effectively prevents hurt during moving and playing.
MUCH BETTER MATERIAL:Made of friendly 0.3mm environment PVC, non-toxic ink printing, leak-proof,may the best material of baby floats.
pfloatguarantee: we guarantee your FLOATS will arrive without any issues or we will replace them for free. No Questions Asked
